home.title: S&L Management and Consulting GmbH
home.description: Premium Family Office Services in Switzerland

hero.title: Welcome to S & L Management
hero.subtitle: Consulting GmbH
hero.description: At SLMC, we provide high-end Family Office Services delivered through a holistic and tailored approach to help you achieve your unique lifestyle goals.

about.title: About SLMC
about.description1: Your Trusted Lifestyle Solution Partner S & L Management and Consulting GmbH (SLMC) is a leading Swiss multi-family office, serving ultra-high-net-worth individuals and families from our headquarters in Canton Schwyz, Switzerland. We offer a comprehensive suite of tailor-made advisory services, including wealth management, family succession planning, and private lifestyle solutions.
about.description2: By combining in-depth expertise with a personalized approach, we ensure your family's evolving needs are seamlessly taken care of, letting you focus on what truly matters. Experience excellence with SLMC and discover a new standard in family office services.

services.title: Our Core Services
services.description: At SLMC, we understand that managing personal and financial matters requires a truly holistic approach. We provide a comprehensive suite of premium services—from insurance and healthcare management to residency planning and wealth planning—designed to offer you peace of mind at every stage.

1.title: Insurance
1.description: Comprehensive insurance solutions tailored to protect your assets and lifestyle.

2.title: Health Care Management
2.description: Premium healthcare coordination ensuring you receive the best medical attention worldwide.

3.title: Residency Planning
3.description: Expert guidance on global mobility, residency options, and citizenship programs.

4.title: Wealth Planning
4.description: Strategic wealth management solutions designed to preserve and grow your assets.

5.title: Bespoke Services
5.description: Customized solutions for your unique personal and family requirements.

6.title: Legal & Tax Advice
6.description: Specialized legal and tax consultation to optimize your global position.

whyChoose.title: Why You Should Choose SLMC
whyChoose.description: We combine expertise, trust, and a client-first approach to deliver exceptional family office services.

1.title: Expert Team
1.description: Our team of professionals brings unparalleled expertise in their respective fields, ensuring you receive the highest quality service.

2.title: Trusted Partnership
2.description: We collaborate with trusted partners to deliver specialized services, ensuring compliance and reliability in every aspect of your experience.

3.title: Client-Centric Approach
3.description: Your unique needs and expectations are the foundation of our advisory services. We are committed to building long-term relationships based on trust and understanding.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Contact our team to learn more about how we can help you achieve your lifestyle and wealth management goals.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subTitle: SLMC - Your Lifestyle Solutions Expert.
aboutUs.description1: At S & L Management and Consulting LLC (SLMC), we are proud to be your trusted partner for comprehensive lifestyle solutions and family office services. Our commitment to excellence is grounded in a broad spectrum of industry experience, a dedication to personalized service, and a global network of esteemed partners.
aboutUs.description2: SLMC is headquartered in Canton Schwyz (Switzerland), the central Swiss canton bordered by Lake Zürich and Lake Lucerne, known for its Finance, Blockchain and Health Tech Cluster in Switzerland. SLMC has its presence as well in Beijing (PRC).
aboutUs.description3: We collaborate closely with selected premium partners in Switzerland and Asia to craft comprehensive and individual lifestyle solutions to families or individuals with business or private interest in Switzerland and Asia.

team.title: Our Team
team.description1: SLMC is a team with diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Our commitment to excellence is underpinned by a rich tapestry of experience and a dedication to personalized service. Our Swiss Team is leading by Prof. Dr. Andreas Svoboda. We work closely together with premium selected external partners specialize in navigating the complexities of the financial world, including banking, insurance, and family office services. With a keen understanding of the unique challenges faced by UHNWI, we deliver tailored solutions to meet the highest standards.
team.description2: SLMC proudly announces the inauguration of its Beijing Desk in response to growing customer demands across Asia. Spearheaded by the dynamic Ms. Lingnan Ren, our dedicated team stands ready to serve you in Mandarin, ensuring seamless communication and unparalleled assistance.

1.name: Prof. Dr. Andreas Svoboda
1.description: With over two decades in the global financial services industry, Prof. Dr. Svoboda is also a mentor, coach, and respected academic at Swiss universities. He leads our team in delivering comprehensive private and family lifestyle solutions, tailored to your unique goals.

2.name: Ms. Lingnan Ren
2.description: Equipped with a strong academic background in Economics from Hebei University of Technology, Ms. Ren brings invaluable experience from Mingya Insurance and the media/publishing sectors. Fluent in English and Mandarin, she heads SLMC’s Beijing Desk—offering personalized assistance and world-class service to a diverse clientele.

familyService.title: Our Family Services
familyService.description: Below is a brief overview of the specialized services we offer to ensure every aspect of your personal, financial, and professional life is optimally managed. Select any of the services to learn more or contact us directly for a personalized consultation.

1.title: Insurance
1.description: Protect your assets and loved ones with our comprehensive insurance solutions. Our advisors conduct in-depth reviews and craft personalized strategies, ensuring every aspect of your life is fully covered.

2.title: Relocation Services
2.description: Make your move stress-free with our specialized relocation services. From destination research to settling-in support, we handle every detail for a smooth transition—no matter where life takes you.

3.title: Wealth Planning
3.description: Secure your financial future with our expert wealth planning solutions. We develop customized strategies that align your assets with your personal goals and aspirations—ensuring long-term growth and stability.

4.title: Tax & Legal Advice
4.description: Navigate complex tax and legal landscapes with confidence. Our advisors provide strategic guidance to optimize your financial position and ensure full compliance with relevant regulations.

5.title: Healthcare Management
5.description: Enjoy first-class healthcare through our partnerships with leading providers. We coordinate everything from routine check-ups to specialized treatments, ensuring prompt and premium medical services.

6.title: Real Estate Services
6.description: Find your perfect home or investment property with our real estate experts. From property searches and negotiations to seamless closings, we make your real estate journey both rewarding and efficient.

7.title: Bespoke Services
7.description: Experience truly customized solutions with our exclusive Bespoke Services. We address your unique requirements with unparalleled attention to detail and service excellence.

newsEvent.title: Family Business Management
newsEvent.subTitle: By Dr. Andreas Svoboda
newsEvent.description1: Running a family business is a balancing act—blending tradition with innovation, family ties with financial responsibility. Family Business Management explores the unique challenges and opportunities of family enterprises, offering insights for success.
newsEvent.description2: Family businesses thrive on relationships—both their greatest strength and challenge. Family Business Management explores ownership, governance, succession, and family dynamics while addressing fiscal responsibilities and global influences. Through real-life case studies, it highlights successes, common pitfalls, and strategies for sustainable growth. Whether you're passing the torch or stepping into leadership, this guide ensures business longevity without compromising family bonds.

1.title: Insurance Brokerage Services
1.description: S&L MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING GMBH (hereinafter referred to as 'SLMC') is an independent insurance broker company for life and non-life insurance, in accordance with Art. 40 Para. 2 of the Insurance Supervision Act (VAG). At the beginning of the cooperation with the customer, a customer advisor is appointed to take care of their insurance policies, and acts as a direct point of contact. SLMC and its customer advisors have the necessary registrations to provide brokerage services in accordance with Swiss insurance supervision legislation (FINMA intermediary register No. F01470698).

2.title: Service Scope & Agreement
2.description: The customer commissions SLMC in the sense of a business relationship based on mutual trust through a separate broker agreement with the ongoing support of its insurance companies. The ones hereafter The information listed forms an integral part of a broker agreement, which only may be modified or supplemented by a document signed by both contracting parties. SLMC is commissioned to negotiate with insurers on behalf of the customer, obtain offers and, after approval by the customer, to place and manage the insurance policies. SLMC advises and assists the customer in all insurance matters that form part of the broker agreement; d. h. especially in risk and insurance analysis, when formulating a risk and Insurance policy, in concepts for risk financing solutions, in determining the Insurance requirements, placement and ongoing support of insurance companies and Support and assistance in the event of a claim with insurers. The information from Customer advisors and specialists from SLMC are based on many years of experience as an insurance broker. You have legal or Tax advice from e.g. E.g. lawyers, banks, tax experts or any other Authorities cannot be replaced in specific individual cases.

3.title: Transparent Compensation
3.description: For the provision of the services in accordance with Section 2, SLMC will be charged a standard brokerage fee, which is paid by the insurer. The brokerage fee is calculated as a percentage of the Customers paid insurance premium. The brokerage fee is included in the premiums offered by insurers contain. Before the broker agreement begins, SLMC informs the customer about the Calculation bases and ranges or the estimated amount of the expected brokerage fees the available information about the customer’s insurance portfolio. The customer agrees After signing a broker agreement, you agree to the release of the brokerage fee waive, and confirms that he has been expressly informed about the compensation by SLMC. SLMC upon request, discloses the amounts actually received. SLMC expressly waives any volume, Growth- or damage-dependent additional compensation from third parties. Other forms of compensation are to be agreed separately in writing between the contracting parties. For further additional services, which are provided at the customer’s request, SLMC will make a separate agreement with the customer in advance Agree on a fee.

4.title: Insurer Relationships
4.description: SLMC has cooperation agreements with all major licensed companies in Switzerland Insurers, but is neither legal nor legal within the meaning of Swiss insurance supervision legislation economically tied to an insurance company in another way. SLMC looks after the Insurance contracts of the customer in agreement with the responsible insurers. SLMC provides in In this sense, also services that reduce the workload for insurers. SLMC stands however, expressly in a relationship of loyalty to the customer and only represents their interests. The The responsible insurer takes care of risk identification as well as claims handling and settlement usually in agreement with SLMC; At the request of the customer, SLMC supports and accompanies the customer Customers in claims handling and settlement. The premium is usually collected directly through the insurer.

5.title: Data Protection
5.description: SLMC guarantees that its employees use the data entrusted to them in accordance with the principles of Swiss law on data protection. Where for the correct fulfillment of the If data transfer abroad is necessary for broker services, the customer agrees Transferring your data abroad in compliance with data protection by SLMC. The customer SLMC agrees to the processing of the data by means of services offered by insurers or third parties Applications that serve to simplify the administrative support of the policies. All in The customer’s data obtained as part of the contract management as well as information regarding it Business activities are treated confidentially and solely for the purpose of carrying out the business Broker agreement edited. Carriers of this data are kept under lock and key at SLMC only accessible to SLMC employees. In relation to uninvolved third parties, this is unrestricted Strict confidentiality is maintained beyond the existence of the contractual relationship. SLMC reserves the right To pass on data to the service providers used, insofar as this is necessary to fulfill the broker services or is necessary to troubleshoot and improve applications operated by SLMC. This applies in particular to the forwarding of data to insurers or third-party providers Tendering or renewal of policies as well as in connection with claims. The each SLMC’s current data protection declaration is available at www.slmc.ch and forms an integrating Part of a broker agreement.

6.title: Professional Qualifications
6.description: The registered customer advisors and specialists from SLMC have the legally required training and complete the mandatory ones Further training in accordance with Art. 43 VAG. Monitor the industry organizations recognized by FINMA compliance with the legal minimum standards. Inquiries about training or further education for individuals registered customer advisors and specialists can be addressed to the following office: S&L Management and Consulting GmbH, management, Feldstrasse 23, 8853 Lachen.

7.title: Liability Framework
7.description: SLMC provides the services with due care and attention. For one, possibly through negligence, SLMC is liable to the customer for any damage resulting from errors or incorrect information as follows Principles: SLMC and its bodies and employees are only liable for intentional or grossly negligent acts breaches of contract and only for any causal damages, costs and expenses that are direct and directly to the customer from such an intentional or grossly negligent breach of contract. Any liability for such damage, including all costs and expenses, is limited to: Limited to twice the annual compensation for SLMC under a brokerage agreement, in all cases however, a maximum of CHF 2,000,000. In no event shall SLMC be liable for any claims arising from intentional, grossly negligent or incorrect behavior by the customer, his employees or for claims for Damages due to incomplete, incorrect or misleading documents, documents or Information from the customer or third parties. S&L Management and Consulting GmbH, Feldstrasse 23, As a contractual partner, 8853 Lachen is the contact point within the meaning of Art. 45 Para. 1 lit. dVAG.
